com.soa.binding.template

Interface BindingTemplate


  • public interface BindingTemplate
    The BindingTemplate is a template interface for identifying metadata about a type of WSDL binding that is used by the Governance Console.
    Since:
    6.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAccessPointAsString(javax.wsdl.Port port)
      Returns string representation of access point which implements this type of binding given access point WSDL port.
      java.lang.String getCapabilityUri()
      Returns the URI that identifies the capability associated with support for this type of binding.
      java.lang.String getType()
      Returns an String identifier for the type of WSDL binding.
      boolean isAccesspointWithProtocolSupported(javax.wsdl.Binding binding, java.lang.String protocolOrCapabilityUri)
      Returns whether a given access point or protocol is suppored by a given binding.
      boolean isTransportSupported(javax.wsdl.Binding binding, EndpointConfiguration transport, ContainerMetadata containerMetadata)
      Validate container transport is applicable for the binding.
      boolean match(javax.wsdl.Binding binding)
      Returns true if specific WSDL binding instance represents this WSDL binding type.

      Update WSDL port representation of access point which implements this type of binding given access point listener url and existing access point WSDL Port element.

      Update WSDL port representation of access point which implements this type of binding given access point full url and existing access point WSDL Port element.

      Validate access point WSDL port is compatible with the binding type.

    • Method Detail

      • getCapabilityUri

        java.lang.String getCapabilityUri()
        Returns the URI that identifies the capability associated with support for this type of binding.
        Returns:
        String representation of the capablity URI.

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        Returns an String identifier for the type of WSDL binding. The identifier is used to identify bindings of this type in the system. It is also used as a key for looking up binding specific labels and messages in the system's resource bundle.
        Returns:
        String identifier for the type of binding, i.e., "soap1.1/http".

      • match

        boolean match(javax.wsdl.Binding binding)
       throws GException
        Returns true if specific WSDL binding instance represents this WSDL binding type. In all other cases, returns false.
        Parameters:
        binding - represents WSDL binding instance taken from WSDL document
        Returns:
        Throws:
        GException

      • getAccessPointAsString

        java.lang.String getAccessPointAsString(javax.wsdl.Port port)
                                 throws GException
        Returns string representation of access point which implements this type of binding given access point WSDL port.
        Parameters:
        port - represents WSDL port instance taken from WSDL document
        Returns:
        Throws:
        GException

      • updateAccessPointWithUrl

        void updateAccessPointWithUrl(javax.wsdl.Port port,
                              java.lang.String url)
                       throws GException
        Update WSDL port representation of access point which implements this type of binding given access point full url and existing access point WSDL Port element. This API is optional. However, if not implemented, some features of the product won't be supported like service migration with url mapping and UDDI publication APIs updating access point.
        Parameters:
        port - existing WSDL port element which needs to be updated from the access point url
        url - represents access point full url string representation
        Throws:
        GException - when 1. the binding type does not allow updates to binding access point with external APIs like UDDI Publication APIs 2. the binding type does not match access point url

      • updateAccessPointWithListenerUrl

        void updateAccessPointWithListenerUrl(javax.wsdl.Port port,
                                      java.lang.String url,
                                      java.lang.String urlToReplace)
                               throws GException
        Update WSDL port representation of access point which implements this type of binding given access point listener url and existing access point WSDL Port element. This API is required if virtual services will use this type of binding.
        Parameters:
        port - existing WSDL port element which needs to be updated from the access point url
        url - represents access point listener address. For JMS, url is in normalized WebSphere format.
        urlToReplace - existing listener url to replace
        Throws:
        GException - when this binding template does not support virtual services

      • validateAccessPoint

        boolean validateAccessPoint(javax.wsdl.Port port)
                     throws GException
        Validate access point WSDL port is compatible with the binding type.
        Parameters:
        port - WSDL representation of access point to validate
        Returns:
        true if access point is valid
        Throws:
        GException

      • isTransportSupported

        boolean isTransportSupported(javax.wsdl.Binding binding,
                             EndpointConfiguration transport,
                             ContainerMetadata containerMetadata)
                      throws GException
        Validate container transport is applicable for the binding.
        Parameters:
        binding -
        transport -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        GException

      • isAccesspointWithProtocolSupported

        boolean isAccesspointWithProtocolSupported(javax.wsdl.Binding binding,
                                           java.lang.String protocolOrCapabilityUri)
                                    throws GException
        Returns whether a given access point or protocol is suppored by a given binding.
        Parameters:
        binding - Binding object of the WSDL
        protocolOrCapabilityUri - Accesspoint of type protocol or the capability uri that implements the protocol
        Returns:
        Throws:
        GException
